participant_1.background:
I play soccer on the weekends to keep myself active and to have some fun.
i haven t had luck with finding a job.
i like gardening.
I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren.
i spend an hour getting ready in the morning.

participant_2.background:
My family is my world and I love to explore new places with them.
I try to find solace in my planning and excitement for my upcoming trip to Europe.
I try to take a walk outside to clear my head.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
i have a cat named charlie.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
Hello there! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you doing this evening?
I am doing well too! Thank you for asking. I am just getting ready for work now.
Oh, that sounds exciting! What do you do for work?
I am a software engineer. I am currently looking for a new job.
Oh, that sounds like a great job! I hope you find a new job soon. What kind of hobbies do you have?
I like to play soccer on the weekends, and I also like to garden. I also love to watch horror movies with my grandchildren.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to explore new places with my family, and I also like to take walks outside to clear my head. I have a cat named Charlie.
That sounds great! I love to travel, but I haven't been able to go anywhere lately. I have a cat named Mittens.
Mittens is a great name for a cat! I love cats.
Me too! Cats are the best.
I agree! I am glad we are having this conversation
